TopicTitle: [1.2.x] [1.4 in Development] Real KSC in KSP Dev Continued

Articles.Content:

looks great felbourn... I see you got lacks trees
Did ALOT of modeling today on SLC-17... and I think it is looking pretty good
As far as I know your LC-19 is all done, but if you have anything more you were planning then it would be great to get that. I am moving into Gemini flights now.

As far as I know your LC-19 is all done, but if you have anything more you were planning then it would be great to get that. I am moving into Gemini flights now.

In fact I was actually gonna do a little remodeling to SLC-19 tomorrow. If you can wait till tomorrow afternoon I can send It your way
Yes, I am building my Gemini tonight and will not be able to launch it until at least 24 hours from now.

Yes, I am building my Gemini tonight and will not be able to launch it until at least 24 hours from now.

Ok cool. I send it to you tomorrow
Finally managed to learn UV unwrap in blender... Modelling nearly done, gantry still screwing me up, but getting there. Also spreadsheet is down. Anyone know why?

Yep, in fact I recently added LC-37 to my RSS game:

Wouldn't it be better to tilt the runway just a little bit so that it is flush with ground? It is normal for runways not to be perfectly level.

Ooh! Nice looking Saturn I!
Any updates on launch sites modelling?
I handed all of mine over to Triston since modeling is done, they should be done soon. I also heard somewhere that release is scheduled #soon TM R
I'm launching tonight. I'll use what I have on hand to make a site unless you have new assets ready?

I'm launching tonight. I'll use what I have on hand to make a site unless you have new assets ready?

Yes I'm really sorry.. I had a family emergency and I couldn't work LC-19. So I am to blame

- - - Updated - - -

Any updates on launch sites modelling?

Yes the update is: My models are coming along quite well. Major handed over his work to mE. Kart is finishing up his models and we are all letting liquidhype her Amazing launch vehicles for her other mod.
